net.powermatcher.api.monitoring

Interface ObservableAgent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Agent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Auctioneer, BaseAgent, BaseAgentEndpoint, BaseMatcherEndpoint, Concentrator, PeakShavingConcentrator

    public interface ObservableAgent
extends Agent
    ObservableAgent defines the interface with the basic functionality needed to be able to be observed by an AgentObserver.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.powermatcher.api.Agent

        Agent.Status

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      void addObserver(AgentObserver observer)
      Used to add an AgentObserver to the list of observers of this instance.
      void removeObserver(AgentObserver observer)
      Used to remove an AgentObserver from the list of observers of this instance.

        Used to remove an AgentObserver from the list of observers of this instance.
